trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeração e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.
